comments.body: I'll take a todo for that

Thanks. Ideally most of the functionality in kubectl would be available as libraries for direct programmatic use by clients.

That said, another way to address this particular instance is to add the plugin transformation pipeline framework proposed in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/issues/1905#issuecomment-60330363, in which case these could be written as routines that take in object streams and return object streams.
